main.description: I am a passionate designer and a developer too. This piece is just a showcase of my work.
main.bio: Hi, my name is Animesh Anurag.I am in my final year of Software Engineering in SRM University, Chennai. With the Passion for well-crafted (digital) experiences, I believe in beauty to empower ideas. My goal is to connect people with brands & businesses through design. A combination of strong concepts and refined execution to deliver premium results. Currently I’m working as a freelancer and also completing my graduation degree. I’m wanted to get an industry level experience and want to grow myself further.
main.contactmessage: Hey, I hope you liked my portfolio website. This was completely build using React and if you liked my work then you can reach out to me using methods given below

resume.skillmessage: Thank you for taking the time to review my resume. I truly believe that my past experience and education would make me a valuable asset for your organization. I'm particularly excited about the opportunity to learn more about web developement, app developement, UI and UX and how I can contribute to that effort. I believe that learning has no end, one can work hard and gain knowledge for lifetime.
